law.text:
This chapter applies to all cases of birth out of wedlock:
Where birth occurs within this state;
When birth occurs out of this state at the time the mother is a resident of this state after June 18, 1964; or
When birth occurs out of this state and at some time following the birth the mother becomes a resident of this state after June 18, 1964.
law.history: Amended 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 159, sec. 5. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 210, sec. 1. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 37, sec. 18.
